text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the HP Omen 15-dc0030nr 15.6" FHD IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 128 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Apex Legends. The build quality of the HP Omen 15-dc0030nr 15.6" FHD IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 128 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is solid, and the keyboard is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The speakers is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the HP Omen 15-dc0030nr 15.6" FHD IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 128 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The battery life is also top-notch.
